summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EcoTrails hiking companion app - both backend API and frontend functionality tested successfully

minor_bugs.issue: Root health check returns HTML instead of JSON

configuration_issues.impact: Geocoding features unavailable but core functionality works
configuration_issues.solution: Enable Geocoding API in Google Cloud Console

passed_tests: Backend API health check (6/8 endpoints working)
Magic link authentication flow - working correctly
Place weather API - returning temperature data (36.52Â°F)
Place trails API - found 8 trails including Grand Prismatic Spring Overlook Trail
AI Companion insight generation - working with bird observation example
Nearby places search - found 44 places near Yellowstone
Frontend onboarding flow - all steps working properly
Frontend login page - email input and magic link submission working
Responsive design and UI elements functioning correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Enable Google Maps Geocoding API in Google Cloud Console to fix REQUEST_DENIED error. The root health check endpoint should return JSON instead of HTML for consistency.
